awd_titl_txt: Experimental Investigation of Stability and Transition of    Flow Between Two Rotating Disks
awd_abstract_narration: Instability saves and transition to turbulence are to be                        experimentally investigated for flows confined between rotating                 disks.  Both conventional and non-Newtonian fluids (through polymer             addition) will be utilized to explore unsteady flow modes and                   characteristics, using flow visualization techniques (flake                     suspensions) and quantitative velocity measurements from LDV (Laser-            Doppler Velocimeter).  The flows to be investigated are of                      fundamental interest regarding centrifugal effects and curvature, and           are also relevant to lubrication and viscometers used to determine              Newtonian and non-Newtonian fluid properties.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: UNIVERSITY OF PITTSBURGH - OF THE COMMONWEALTH SYSTEM OF HIGHER EDUCATION
